Texts.Eng:
Parasites found on fletchweed. Converts saliva into hallucinogens.
^cyan;+^white;30 ^cyan;EP^gray;, ^cyan;Heavily Intoxicated^gray;, ^red;Insanity^gray;, ^reset;(^white;220s^reset;) ^blue;Madness Gain^reset; 2
Texts.Chs:
在弗莱彻草上发现寄生虫。能将唾液转化为致幻剂。
^cyan;+^white;30^cyan;EP^gray;^cyan;重度中毒^gray;^red;疯狂^gray;^reset;（^white;220s^reset;）^blue;癫狂^reset;2
